That's great to hear that #fitnessmotivation is performing well for you!

To promote your branded hashtag #mindfulmornings using Instagram's built-in features, follow these steps:

1. **Create a branded hashtag page**: Encourage your followers to use #mindfulmornings by creating a dedicated page for it. Post a few high-quality, visually appealing photos or videos that showcase what #mindfulmornings means to your brand. Use relevant keywords in your caption to help Instagram understand the context.
2. **Use Instagram Stories and Reels**: Share behind-the-scenes content, sneak peeks, or exclusive deals related to #mindfulmornings in your Instagram Stories and Reels. You can add the hashtag to your Stories and Reels, and even create a "Hashtag Story" to encourage user-generated content (UGC).
3. **Instagram Live**: Host a live session focused on #mindfulmornings, where you can share tips, Q&A, or a guided meditation. This will help create engagement and encourage viewers to use the hashtag.
4. **Instagram Guides**: Create a Guide that showcases your favorite #mindfulmornings content, including tips, products, or routines. This will help users discover your branded hashtag and create a curated experience.
5. **Collaborate with influencers and users**: Reach out to influencers or users who align with your brand and ask them to share their own #mindfulmornings content. You can also re-share or feature their posts on your page to create social proof.
6. **Instagram's "Reels" tab**: Use the "Reels" tab on your profile to showcase your #mindfulmornings content. This will help new followers discover your branded hashtag and encourage them to explore more.
7. **Hashtag Challenge**: Host a hashtag challenge where you encourage followers to share their own #mindfulmornings moments. You can offer incentives, such as a free resource or a feature on your page, to encourage participation.
8. **Instagram's "Shopping" feature**: If you have an Instagram Shopping-enabled account, tag your products in your #mindfulmornings posts. This will help users discover your products and associate them with your branded hashtag.
9. **Consistency is key**: Post content regularly using #mindfulmornings to maintain a consistent aesthetic and keep your followers engaged.
10. **Monitor and engage**: Keep an eye on the hashtag and engage with users who are posting with #mindfulmornings. Like, comment, and respond to their content to build a community around your branded hashtag.

Remember to track your hashtag's performance using Instagram Insights or a third-party analytics tool to understand its reach, engagement, and growth over time. This will help you refine your strategy and optimize your content for better results.

By following these steps, you'll be able to effectively promote your branded hashtag #mindfulmornings and build a loyal community around it.
